impulse::Express

impulse::Express Class Reference

An expression is a sequence of Values, which when evaluated calls eval() on each Value with the previous result as the receiver. More...

Detailed Description

An expression is a sequence of Values, which when evaluated calls eval() on each Value with the previous result as the receiver.
